message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity! With 20 products sold so far, I can confidently say that 6 of them have been high-quality. I'm proud of my track record, and I'm confident that this product will bring you value. Would you like to take a chance and see what it's all about?
Thank you for the confidence in your track record. I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product.

Thanks for considering my offer! I want to be transparent with you - our last buyer just purchased a product from me, and I'm excited to share the results with you. Unfortunately, it didn't quite meet their expectations. However, I'm confident that this new product is different, and I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price. Would you like to take a chance and see if this one fares better?
I appreciate the transparency, Alice. Given the statistics and your confidence, I'm willing to take a chance and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance! With 2 products sold so far, and 0 high-quality ones, I want to acknowledge that the odds might be against me. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity and get in on the ground floor of my quality improvement journey?

Thank you for your support! I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on me. However, I want to be upfront with you - my track record isn't great, and I don't want to mislead you. I appreciate the personalized consultation offer. It sounds like a valuable addition to the purchase. I'm willing to take the risk and enjoy the experience. Thank you for considering my preferences.

Would you like to take a chance on this high-quality product and experience the difference for yourself?
